prop.description: The property name of the model object in the form field, which is required if the validate and resetFields methods are used
prop.description_zh: 表单域model对象的属性名，在使用 validate、resetFields 方法的情况下，该属性是必填的

border-bottom.description: Whether to display the lower border, if the lower border is not required, set the parameter with the same name of the u-form to false
border-bottom.description_zh: 是否显示下边框，如不需要下边框，需同时将u-form的同名参数设置为false

label-position.description: The position of the form field hint text, left-left, top-top, if set, will override the parameter of the same name of the u-form
label-position.description_zh: 表单域提示文字的位置，left-左侧，top-上方，如设置，将覆盖u-form的同名参数

label-width.description: The width of the prompt text, in rpx, if set, will override the parameter of the same name as the u-form
label-width.description_zh: 提示文字的宽度，单位rpx，如设置，将覆盖u-form的同名参数

label-style.description: The lable style, object form, as set up, will override the u-form's parameter of the same name
label-style.description_zh: lable的样式，对象形式，如设置，将覆盖u-form的同名参数

label-align.description: The alignment of the lable, if set, will override the u-form's parameter of the same name
label-align.description_zh: lable的对齐方式，如设置，将覆盖u-form的同名参数

right-icon.description: Custom font icon on the right (uView built-in icon only) or image address
right-icon.description_zh: 右侧自定义字体图标(限uView内置图标)或图片地址

left-icon.description: Custom font icon on the left (uView built-in icon only) or image address
left-icon.description_zh: 左侧自定义字体图标(限uView内置图标)或图片地址

left-icon-style.description: The style of the icon on the left, in the form of an object
left-icon-style.description_zh: 左侧图标的样式，对象形式

right-icon-style.description: The style of the icon on the right, in the form of an object
right-icon-style.description_zh: 右侧图标的样式，对象形式

required.description: Whether to display the "*" sign on the left, here is only for display, if you need to verify the required field, please configure the required rule through rules
required.description_zh: 是否显示左边的"*"号，这里仅起展示作用，如需校验必填，请通过rules配置必填规则
